ownerships.owner: The Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust

familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of DJT Aerospace LLC, of which Trump retains an ownership stake through The Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust. According to a financial disclosure, the sole assets are aircraft. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned None (or less than $201) in  income from DJT AEROSPACE LLC, valued at $1,000,001 - $5,000,000. Underlying Assets: aircraft. Location: New York, NY. See attached schedule.
Ivanka Trump served as Executive Vice President of DJT AEROSPACE LLC (aircraft) from Jun 1, 2010, until Jan 1, 2017.
